gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਾਪ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪ ਅਤਿ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਕੈ ਪਰਸਪਰ ਪੂਰਨ ਪ੍ਰਗਾਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gursikh Sangati Milaap Ko Prataap Ati , Praym Kai Parasapar Pooran Pragaas Hai ?
translation: Significance of meeting of Guru and Guru-oriented men is limitless. Because of deep love in the heart of the Sikh of the Guru, light divine then glows in him.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸ ਅਨੂਪ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਅੰਗ ਅੰਗ ਛਬਿ ਹੇਰਤ ਹਿਰਾਨੇ ਦ੍ਰਿਗ ਬਿਸਮ ਬਿਸ੍ਵਾਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Daras Anoop Roop Rang Ang Ang Chhabi , Hayrat Hiraanay Drig Bisam Bisvaas Hai ?
translation: Seeing the beauty of the True Guru, His form, colour and image of His every limb, the eyes of a Guru-loving person are astonished. It also generates craving in his mind to see and behold the True Guru.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਅਨਹਦ ਰੁਨਝੁਨ ਧੁਨਿ ਸੁਨਤ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮਤਿ ਹਰਨ ਅਭਿਅਾਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabad Nidhaan Anahad Rounajhoun Dhouni , Sounat Surati Mati Haran Abhiaas Hai ?
translation: By inexhaustible practicing of meditation on Guru's words, a soft and mellow tune of unstruck music appears in the mystical tenth door. Perpetual hearing of it causes him to remain in a state of trance.

gurmukhi: ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਦਰਸ ਅਰੁ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਪਰਮਦਭੁਤ ਗਤਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬਿਲਾਸ ਹੈ ॥੨੮੪॥
transliteration: Drisati Daras Aru Sabad Surati Mili , Paramadabhout Gati Pooran Bilaas Hai ?284?
translation: By focusing his vision in the True Guru and keeping the mind engrossed in the teachings and sermons of the Guru, he acquires a state of perfect and complete bloom. (284)
